title: General Theory of Relativity
description: A geometric theory of gravitation that refines Newton's law of universal gravitation, describing gravity as the curvature of spacetime caused by mass and energy.

title: The Universal Computing Machine
description: Developing a theoretical mathematical model of a general-purpose computer, capable of simulating any other machine's logic. This work lays the foundation for modern computer science.

title: Isolation of Radium & Polonium
description: Investigating radiation phenomena in uranium rays, leading to the discovery of two new elements: polonium and radium. This research coined the term 'radioactivity'.
